section.name: Unit 1: Building Our Knowledge of New Content
section.summary: In Unit 1, you will discover what the research says are effective principles of learning for instructional design, based on key findings from Improving Adult Literacy Instruction: Supporting Learning and Motivation, a publication which emerged from the National Research Council report, Improving Adult Literacy Instruction: Options for Practice and Research (2012).  Through narrated PowerPoint presentations, subject-matter experts guide your reflection on your related knowledge and prior experience as adult learners and teachers and share their own related teaching experiences in the classroom. A short quiz helps check your comprehension of the principles.
